spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout and room placement align well with the 2D plan. However, there is a discrepancy in door swings (orientation) and some wall thickness/alignment issues near the entrance and utility area.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms are present and the roof is correctly removed. No text or UI elements are visible. The model floats on a dark background. Points deducted for minor structural reinterpretations of the utility opening.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is mostly accurate (bed, sofa, kitchen counter). The dining table swapped from two chairs to six chairs, diverging from the specific plan layout.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent adherence to the requested aesthetic. High-quality low-poly geometry, flat shading, zero photorealistic textures, and a perfect isometric orthographic camera angle.

detected_errors.description: The dining table configuration (6 chairs) does not match the 2D plan layout (2 chairs).
Door orientation/swing directions in the hallway and bedroom differ from the 2D blueprint.
Hallucinated side tables added to the bedroom which were not present in the original plan.
